channel.title: CVE Feed for curatorio -- Curator.io: Show all your social media posts in a beautiful feed.
channel.description: The latest CVEs for curatorio -- Curator.io: Show all your social media posts in a beautiful feed.

item.title: CVE-2024-9057|2024-10-10T13:12:15.053Z -- curatorio -- curator.io%3A%20show%20all%20your%20social%20media%20posts%20in%20a%20beautiful%20feed.
item.description: The Curator.io: Show all your social media posts in a beautiful feed. plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘feed_id’ attribute in all versions up to, and including, 1.9 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-9057|2024-10-10T02:06:09.939Z -- curatorio -- curator.io%3A%20show%20all%20your%20social%20media%20posts%20in%20a%20beautiful%20feed.
item.description: The Curator.io: Show all your social media posts in a beautiful feed. plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘feed_id’ attribute in all versions up to, and including, 1.9 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
